 49 -  def _create_pixmaps(self, icons):

 56      return result

 76 -  def timerEvent(self, event): 

 77      #logger.debug('changing movie frame') 
 78      self.setPixmap(self.pixmaps[self.current_frame]) 
 79      self.current_frame += 1 
 80      if self.current_frame > self.last_frame:
